original_text: For I beheld, and there was no man; even among them, and there was no counsellor, that, when I asked of them, could answer a word.
korean_text: 내가 본즉 한 사람도 없으며 내가 물어도 그들 가운데에 한 말도 대답할 조언자가 없도다

sentences.original_text: For I beheld, and there was no man
even among them, and there was no counsellor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중에도 도움을 줄 자가 없었으며

sentences.original_text: that, when I asked of them, could answer a word
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 물을 때 대답 한마디 할 자가 없었느니라
